description: This Python script sets up a knowledge base using a PDF document, integrates it with a vector database (LanceDb), configures an agent with storage and language model, and performs a query to generate a response based on the knowledge base.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base and language model to generate responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base constructed from PDF URLs, stored in a vector database.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: A storage class for persisting agent data in an SQLite database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation using LanceDb.

classes.name: OllamaEmbedder
classes.description: An embedder class for Ollama models.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates the storage in the database if it does not exist.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response to a query, formatted in Markdown.
